python:
"""
This is a 
multi-line comment in Python
"""
print("Comments are ignored by the interpreter.")

x = 10
y = 5.5
name = "Alice"
print(x, y, name)

a = 5         # Integer
b = 3.14      # Float
c = "hello"   # String
d = True      # Boolean

print(type(a), type(b), type(c), type(d))

PI = 3.14159  # Python doesn't have true constants, but uppercase is a convention
print("Value of PI:", PI)
